Help.name: Help
Help.description: Display a list of commands. By default the command result is sent to Direct Messages. Using the 'server' key word will make them send in the server instead. Gives more examples when used for specific command/group.
examples: help ┝ Sends a Direct Message with the first help page by default.
help 2 ┝ Sends a Direct Message with the second help page.
help user ┝ Sends a Direct Message with the commands in the User group.
help imgur ┝ Sends a Direct Message with the commands in the imgur command.
help server ┝ The help message is posted on the server.
help 2 server ┝ The second help page is posted on the server.
help server user ┝ The result for the user 'group' is posted on the server.

Prefix.name: Prefix
Prefix.description: Sets the prefix for the current server.
Prefix.syntax: prefix <symbol> (length no more than 2) or <default> to reset to default. All of the use cases word with the default bot prefix( ~ ) and not just the server prefix.
examples: prefix ┝ Returns the current server prefix.
prefix default ┝ Resets the server prefix to the default bot prefix.
prefix ! ┝ Changes the currnet server prefix to '!'.

Clear.name: Clear
Clear.description: Deletes the requested number of messages.
examples: clear 10 ┝ Clears 10 chat messages in the current channel, not including the command message.

Ping.name: Ping
Ping.description: Pings the bot and returns the delay in milliseconds.
examples: ping ┝ Return: pong [x] milliseconds.

Clap.name: Clap
examples: clap Your sentence here ┝ Resulting sentence: 'Your 👏 sentence 👏 here 👏'.

Reddit.name: Reddit
Reddit.description: Searches based on the given query using the Reddit API.
examples: reddit dank memes ┝ Example of searching for posts with 'dank memes' in the title.
reddit tag aww ┝ Example of searching for posts tagged with 'aww'.
reddit subreddit cats cute kitty ┝ Example of searching r/cats for posts containing 'cute kitty' in the title.

Imgur.name: Imgur
Imgur.description: Searches based on the given query using the Imgur API.
examples: imgur dank memes ┝ Example of searching for posts with 'dank memes' in the title.
imgur tag aww ┝ Example of searching for posts tagged with 'aww'.
imgur subreddit cats cute kitty ┝ Example of searching r/cats for posts containing 'cute kitty' in the title.

Play.name: Play
Play.description: Begins a song queue and makes the bot connect to a voice channel.
examples: play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ ┝ Adds song to the queue.

Queue.name: Queue
Queue.description: Displays the currently playing song and queue.
examples: queue┝ Displays currently playing and queue if any.

Stop.name: Stop
Stop.description: Stops the current queue and leaves the voice channel.
examples: stop ┝ Stops the music.

Skip.name: Skip
Skip.description: Skips to the next song in the queue or leaves the voice channel if no more songs remain.
examples: skip ┝ Skip to the next song in the queue.
